title: Ganyu Mains
description:
A fan community dedicated to Ganyu (a 5* Genshin Impact character) and also a English Genshin Theorycrafting community. Connected with the Second Largest Genshin Impact Network (KQM Network) after the Official Genshin Impact server. Here you can find general game talk, build talks, documents made by theorycrafters for each character, events, anime watching and discussion, twitch streamers and other content creators, and much more!

This server is a member of United Servers Of Discord owned by 505 Games company.
